input_email_body:
Subject: Advice on Secure Medical Data Handling

Dear Customer Support, I am a potential client interested in ensuring that our sensitive medical data is handled with the utmost care You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Could you please guide me on the security measures and services your company offers to protect this information? Additionally, I would appreciate detailed information about the relevant certifications and compliance with industry standards. Your assistance at this time would be greatly appreciated My name is Sophia Rossi.. I look forward to hearing from you soon. Sincerely, [Your Name]
